abstract: IBM reports solid quarterly profits, showing corporations continue to spend on information technology; company reports net earnings of $3.84 billion, a 7 percent increase from the year-earlier quarter; its earnings per share from continuing operations rose 15 percent, to $3.28; revenue for the quarter increased 8 percent, to $26.2 billion.
snippet: I.B.M. reported solid quarterly profits on Monday, but the company’s stock dropped as sales fell short of expectations.
lead_paragraph: I.B.M. reported solid quarterly profits on Monday, but the company’s stock dropped as sales fell short of expectations.

headline.main: I.B.M. Beats Forecasts and Raises Profit Estimate for Year
headline.print_headline: I.B.M. Beats Forecasts and Raises Profit Estimate for Year
